2007–08 Hazfi CupIndex 0: On 17 December 2007, Foolad played against Esteghlal Ahvaz at home and the match ended in a 4-4 draw. Foolad progressed 8-7 on penalties.
2007–08 Hazfi CupIndex 3: On 21 December 2007, Bargh Shiraz hosted Paykan Tehran and won the match with a score of 1-0.
2007–08 Hazfi CupIndex 4: On 21 December 2007, Shahin Bushehr played at home against Saba Battery, with the game ending in a 2-2 draw. Shahin Bushehr advanced 6-5 on penalties.
2007–08 Hazfi CupIndex 5: On 24 December 2007, Pas Hamedan faced Persepolis at home and secured a 3-0 victory.
2007–08 Hazfi CupIndex 6: On 26 February 2008, Moghavemat Sepasi played at home against Sepahan and lost the match 1-2.
